Wczytujemy dane

```{r}
dt <- read.table(file = "../data-raw/ciekawe_dane.csv", header = F, sep = ";", dec = ",")
```

```{r}
summary(dt)
```

```{r}
cor(dt, method = "spearman")
cor(dt, method = "pearson")
```

```{r}
m1 <- lm(V2 ~ V1, data = dt)
m2 <- lm(log(V2) ~ log(V1), data = dt)
summary(m1)
summary(m2)
```

```{r}
plot(dt)
```
